name: aftermath

effect.sword_shield: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.the_crown_tundra: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.legends_arceus: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
